summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2679, for the improvement of the alley in block 81, Terry's 2nd Addition to the City of Seattle, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation, and doing such other work as may be necessary therewith; under Ordinance No. 31556 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
